mapper.select: SELECT sp.exam_id exam_id, sp.paper_code paper_code,sp.student_id student_id, sp.objective_grade,sp.subjective_status subjective_status, u.name student_name, sd.question_id id,sd.def_point total_point,sd.student_answer student_answer, sd.student_point tech_point,sd.question_status question_status, ql.content content, ql.description description,ql.answer answer FROM student_point sp left join `user` u on sp.student_id=u.id and u.del_tag=1 left join student_point_detail sd on sd.exam_id = sp.exam_id LEFT JOIN question_library ql on ql.id=sd.question_id where sp.exam_id=#{examId} and ql.type = "subjective"
